name: egg dog
description:
Hullo! I am egg dog, your friendly desktop pal. I like to run around in a mushroom forest and bork at birbs. Please give me a treat, and I'll be the goodest boy  ૮ ・ﻌ・ა

FEATURES

  • Three different background settings and music that accommodate the time of day (it's as if egg dog is with you!)
  • egg dog will bark at chonky birb, which makes the chonky birb fly faster
  • You can give egg dog pats, and egg dog will pant out of joy
  • You can also give the good boy treats!
  • egg dog will also try to jump at bird, but egg dog too chonk to catch birb

KEYS

  • Left Arrow - egg dog walks left
  • Right Arrow - egg dog walks right
  • Up Arrow - egg dog barks
  • Down Arrow - release purple dog treats
  • Space - egg dog jumps
  • J - decrease background music volume
  • L - increase background music volume

DEVELOPER'S NOTE

Thank you for checking out egg dog! This is my first game that I built entirely myself - from code all the way to the illustrations. Feel free to email me for any inquiries: mjlee3w@gmail.com 

NOTE: You can make a desktop app by creating a shortcut from 'egg dog.exe'

music credits: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
